healthIndex.healthIndexTooltip: The safety of your loan derived from the proportion of collateral versus amount borrowed. Keep it above 1 to avoid liquidation.
healthIndex.usedBorrowingPowerTooltip: The percentage of the maximum borrowing power you are currently using
healthIndex.LTVTooltip: Loan-to-Value represents the maximum borrowing power of your collateral. For example, with a LTV of 66%, you can borrow up to 0.66 worth of ETH in mexican pesos for every 1 ETH worth of collateral.
healthIndex.currentETHPriceTooltip: The current price of ETH, as priced by the protocol
healthIndex.liquidationETHPriceTooltip: The price of ETH at which your collateral will be liquidated to cover your debt
healthIndex.collateralValueTooltip: The current value of your deposited collateral, converted to mexican pesos
healthIndex.maxDebtTooltip: Your maximum allowed debt, taking into account the current value of your collateral
